name: study-pdf-reader
description: AI-powered PDF learning application with automated flashcard generation

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:backend:windows: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check . && black --check .
scripts.lint:backend:windows: cd backend && venv\Scripts\activate && ruff check . && black --check .
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && ruff format . && black .
scripts.format:backend:windows: cd backend && venv\Scripts\activate && ruff format . && black .
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/__pycache__ backend/.pytest_cache backend/venv
scripts.clean:windows: rmdir /s /q frontend\dist frontend\node_modules backend\__pycache__ backend\.pytest_cache backend\venv
